inclusion.criterion: ICD implanted for primary and secondary prevention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: followed in the outpatient clinic of our center
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: persistent/long standing AF without effective anticoagulation

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope.
